idea-plugin.name: Data-Mediator convertor
idea-plugin.description:
This is the bean convertor of Data-Mediator. That convert bean data to the module of Data-Mediator.
what's Data-Mediator ?
Data-mediator is a framework of data.
It can hele we do much work.
Features:
1, like listen property change,
2, generate get/is/set method.
3, chain call.
4, auto impl Serializable and parcelable. or others.
5, full support for Google/Gson.
6, support data-bind for android platform.
7, support self method/interface.
8, full support data-binding in adapter which can Best Seamless with 'ButterKnife'. 8. ...... the more to see in github.
Plugin which generates Data-mediator code for you.
